description: The iconic large white cockatoo with a big, expressive yellow crest. They are highly intelligent and are often seen in movies and television.
temperament: Extremely intelligent, complex, and demanding. They can be affectionate but often bond with one person and can be aggressive towards others. Require a very experienced owner.
loudness: Extremely Loud. Their screech is deafening and can be heard from a great distance. They are not suitable for close neighbors.
vocalization: Excellent talkers and mimics. They can learn a wide vocabulary and are very good at learning tricks and complex tasks.
dietaryNeeds: Prone to obesity and fatty liver disease. A low-fat pelleted diet with plenty of fresh vegetables is essential. Limit nuts and seeds to treats.
healthPointers: Can live for 60-80 years. Very prone to behavioral problems like feather plucking and screaming if not given immense amounts of attention and stimulation. Produce a lot of feather dust.
housing: Absolutely not for apartments. Requires a very large, strong cage or aviary. Minimum 40"W x 30"D x 60"H.
